DOC.brief_summary: The authors employ a questionary approach to understanding the relational among patients' perceptions of inpatient, outpatient and emergency room service and their overall perceptions of service quality, satisfaction with hospital.The questionary was applied in total 300 patients (100 inpatients, 100 outpatients and 100 emergency patients).
DOC.brief_title: An Empirical Study of Perceived Hospital Service Quality: A Comparison of Inpatient, Outpatient and Emergence Patient
DOC.criteria: Patients who want to write our questionary. Patients who reject to write our questionary.
